TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted,but it cost 1000$

I wish I for an affortable KSP t-short that I can buy and wear without dying.

Granted, but your run over by a bus before you can wear it

(this is not for reals, i do not wish to be a pony) I wonder if i was(im not) a brony(must see curruptness

Wut?

(wow, US vs Equestria, that would be epic! (like avatar or something))

I wish for a good wall paper

Granted, but it turns into a creepy face and you cant reverse it

You didnt answer my brony thing

(this is not for reals, i do not wish to be a pony) I wonder if i was(im not) a brony(must see curruptness)
you know, stop attacking bronys. Please.
Im not. I have not once said anything to a brony along the lines of i hate bronies. I just said im not one

That's wierd, do this forum has been like this from forever (brony stuffs and sh*t) or did I just started (unintentionaly) a bronyy riot all over the games thread?

I wish to understand the situation (this thread must stay on tracks!)

Granted but your head explodes.

I wish to have a pet Creeper (Minecraft) (Be creative)

Granted,but your pet run away when he see a cat.

He them explode and make a bridge collapse,you have to pay cor the damages and you have lost your pet.

I wish I could make more science per mission.

(what is ninja-ing and what are signs of getting ninja-d?)

granted, you gain only 0.01 more science per mission.

I wish threads would not derail so often

granted, but the thread has now transformed from a train to a plane and crashes

I wish to own my cars in GTA online in real life
granted, they are stolen and the police track them down

Granted.

I wish for yellow apples.

Granted you die of food poisoning.

I wish that the universe broke because someone tried to not corrupt my wish.

Granted. The universe is now broken. Great job

I wish for unending stomach pain.

granted, you die a slow and horrible death.

I wish for imaginary numbers

Granted, you become imaginary too

i wish for a bucket of baby lotion.

Granted, There's a alien parasit in it

I wish to have plasma weaponery

Granted, they overheat and malfunction

I wish for spoilers to work again

Granted, but only you can see them.

I wish for a magical poptart cat.

His name is Nyan Cat and never stops singing "na-na-na-na-na-nananana-na-na-na-na-na-nanananana"

I wish I could do anything.

Granted, but you can never think of some exiting to do

I wish that I was good at KSP.

Granted, you become so good at it that the KSP community bans you permanently from ever speaking on the forums again, so that they feel better about their own skills.

I wish that I, for once, could host a [/\/\/\/\/\] multiplayer Minecraft game.

Granted, but no one ever joins

I wish that I could at least land on the moon in KSP.

Granted, but now I get jealous of everyone can mun land but me and go on a Hacking spree.

I wish, Gah, I don't know, corrupt something random please?
